meta.title: Home - William Floyd School District

the william floyd seal on a green background

a photo of elementary grade Students and a teacher
a photo of a family sitting on the floor
photo of a teacher talking to a student

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-36 fsTag-3 fsTag-11 fsTag-14 fsTag-16 fsTag-17 fsTag-18 fsTag-19

div.title: A line of cars from the John S. Hobart Elementary School teacher parade on April 15.

img.alt: A line of cars from the John S. Hobart Elementary School teacher parade on April 15.

div.a: Moriches, Nathaniel Woodhull & William Floyd Elementary Schools to Hold Neighborhood Car Parades

div.p: Friday, April 17, 2020: Beginning at 12 pm today, faculty and staff members from Moriches Elementary School, Nathaniel Woodhull Elementary School and William Floyd Elementary School will venture into their students' neighborhoods for a car parade in which they will deliver special messages of hope and love to the students they miss so much!

article.a: Read More About This Article about Moriches, Nathaniel Woodhull & William Floyd Elementary Schools to Hold Neighborhood Car Parades

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-36 fsTag-3 fsTag-4 fsTag-5 fsTag-7 fsTag-8 fsTag-9 fsTag-10 fsTag-11 fsTag-12 fsTag-13 fsTag-14 fsTag-16 fsTag-17 fsTag-18 fsTag-19 fsTag-54 fsTag-55

div.p: Please bookmark this page and visit it often to see regular updates regarding the public health crisis pertaining to the coronavirus (COVID-19).

article.a: Read More About This Article about Coronavirus Informational Updates

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-36 fsTag-3 fsTag-10 fsTag-11 fsTag-14 fsTag-16 fsTag-17 fsTag-18 fsTag-19

div.title: A sister and brother learning at home

img.alt: A sister and brother learning at home

div.p: The new elementary school distance learning website allows your child to continue learning and remain in daily contact with their educators.

article.a: Read More About This Article about Elementary Distance Learning Now Live

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-36 fsTag-3 fsTag-4 fsTag-5 fsTag-55

div.title: WFHS teachers wear examples of the face shields they are printing

img.alt: WFHS teachers wear examples of the face shields they are printing

div.a: William Floyd Technology Teachers Creating Face Shields to Help Fulfill Critical Healthcare Need

div.p: William Floyd High School technology teachers have been using their unique talents and the latest cutting-edge technology to help fulfill a critical need – creating personal protective equipment (PPE), specifically face shields, for the brave healthcare workers on the front lines at Long Island Community Hospital in Brookhaven.

article.a: Read More About This Article about William Floyd Technology Teachers Creating Face Shields to Help Fulfill Critical Healthcare Need

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-36 fsTag-3 fsTag-4 fsTag-5 fsTag-6 fsTag-7 fsTag-10 fsTag-11 fsTag-13 fsTag-14 fsTag-16 fsTag-17 fsTag-18 fsTag-19

div.title: A Glimmer of Hope - rainbow over the William Floyd School District. (April 4, 2020)

img.alt: A Glimmer of Hope - rainbow over the William Floyd School District. (April 4, 2020)

div.p: During challenging times, the William Floyd school community always comes together and we will get through this together! Stay strong, stay safe, stay home as much as you can, and practice social distancing. We will see you soon!

article.a: Read More About This Article about William Floyd Together

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-36 fsTag-3 fsTag-4 fsTag-5 fsTag-7 fsTag-13

div.a: Canvas Online Education Platform for Grades 6-12

div.p: Canvas is online for grades six through 12! Please click for a direct link to Canvas and directions on how to access it. Please note that this is not new information, it is the same information shared in previous Canvas grades 6-8 and Canvas grades 9-12 updates.

article.a: Read More About This Article about Canvas Online Education Platform for Grades 6-12

div.p: Welcome to the website of the award-winning William Floyd School District located on the south shore of Long Island, approximately 60 miles east of New York City, with an enrollment of approximately 8,700 students attending ten schools K-12. The district provides tremendous opportunities for students ranging from science, technology, engineering and mathematics, Career and Technical Education, music, the arts, athletics, extracurricular activities and much more.

div.span: 240 Mastic Beach Road, Mastic Beach, NY 11951

a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window

article.h2: Governor Extends Statewide School Closures Through May 15

div.p: Governor Cuomo has extended statewide school closures through May 15, 2020.

Please note that throughout this time, we will continue with our online learning for grades K-12, meals will be available by bus weekdays from 10 am to 12 pm and also available for pick-up at the William Floyd High School south parking lot and the Mastic Firehouse from 10 am to 12 pm on weekdays.

Please continue to check the website for the latest information and continue to stay home as much as you can and practice social distancing when you need to go out. Thank you and please stay safe and well.
